metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40369 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged.
metadata.Description: A carefully crafted plugin link invocation could trigger an XSS vulnerability on Apache JSPWiki, related to the Denounce plugin, which could allow the attacker to execute javascript in the victim's browser and get some sensitive information about the victim. Apache JSPWiki users should upgrade to 2.11.0 or later.

criterions.comment: jspwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
